Summary: Saw star-like object, as bright as the largest star.........
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Yuma
There were no other sightings in Yuma on or around September 12th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting watching stars ,at 5:37am, facing west, I saw an object as large and as bright as the largest star (did not flash, no other light on it). It came from (SW), moving in a straight line into the (NE). It was making no sounds...(I see commercial airline all the time, can see their lights and can hear them, traveling East and West, and military aircraft and also can hear them. This object flew out of sight......
